thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 54 of 3060
thread.title: Henry Hunter

author: Henry Hunter
title: Henry Hunter
text: After our initial booking it was decided to extend our rental and we were advised that this was not possible. In responding to a request for our experience I outlined our disappointment in detail. I then went on line and I was able to achieve our initial request. I would certainly recommend your website to any of our friends travelling to the UK and Europe.
